description: Due to approved therapy guidelines the following medications have set maximum quantity limits per copay. These quantity limits are less than the standard pharmacy benefit of a 30-day or 90-day supply.  Quantity limits are determined by the recommended length of therapy and/or routine use of the medication and also apply when the medication form is other than a tablet or capsule.

name: HealthChoice Medicare Supplement Plans Medications with Quantity Limits
